title: Devil's Night Dawning
description: As their kingdom is plunged into conflict, two witch hunters fight to stop a warlock before he unleashes an ancient evil…For centuries, the Order of St Argo has protected the mortal vale from the dark forces of the Other Side. But now the barrier between worlds is breaking down, thanks to the machinations of a crazed demonologist. Only two monks can prevent him covering the lands in darkness - but before they can confront him, they must first survive a civil war.When Adelko is assigned to legendary exorcist and witch hunter Horskram, he expects an adventurous life - but an adventurous death seems more likely when they learn of a sorcerous theft that threatens the world. Left with no choice but to cross war-torn territory to warn their Grand Master of impending calamity, Adelko and Horskram find themselves pursued by hired killers during the day, and something far worse at night…The Broken Stone Chronicle is an epic tale of war, quest, magic and horror, aimed at fantasy fans who enjoy descriptive prose and a slow-paced read, with multiple character POVs set in a detailed and immersive pseudo-medieval world.
author: Damien    Black
